attributes.action: Make wearing of mask compulsory for next 6 months in all public and open spaces.
attributes.additional_details: I see people being careless in the current lockdown and some seem to be in blatant violation of the recommendations when one is outdoors.
attributes.background: The current level of Covid 19 admissions to hospitals and government recommendations of covering the face, making space and washing hands seem to be falling on deaf ears.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917
